column6:
"CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY" Part 1 (of 2)!,2006,2
Still reeling from M-Day, New Excalibur is brought together to become Europe's premier super team. Not everyone is pleased. Guest starring LIONHEART (from the pages of AVENGERS)!
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Steven Cummings | inker:Rick Ketcham | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Peter Pantazis | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan
